input.heading: Input data
input.description: Data uploaded by the user which describes individual case records

prepared.heading: Prepared data
prepared.description: Data prepared for group comparison by the user by removing direct identifiers and reducing to a small number of columns, each containing a small number of categorical values

summary.heading: Summary table
summary.description: A table summarizing the counts and ranks of specified attribute values across both groups and time periods/ordinal attributes

group.heading: Group reports
group.description: Reports generated for selected groups, making comparisons between groups and over time periods/ordinal attributes
